overview: David Ballard is a multifaceted, self-taught musician and a trained sound designer with experience in game development, film, and music production. From an early age David discovered his equal love for video games and music (and sandwiches). Due to his unique academic path he has gained a healthy balance of skill in music composition/recording, game design, and sound design. A wide skill set empowers him to be creatively invested in every aspect of a given project, and to put a great deal of care into more than just his specific duties. David is an idea powerhouse as well as an enemy of onions and popcorn.
